alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Macon; Putnam; Smith (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:44AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Smith, Jackson, southeastern Macon and west central Putnam Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 544 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Carthage, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Gainesboro, Baxter, South Carthage, Dixon Springs, Pleasant Shade and Granville. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 277 and 278. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
